statement.p: The four sequential sides of a quadrilateral have lengths \displaystyle{a}={3.1}, \displaystyle{b}={6.8}, \displaystyle{c}={7.8}, and \displaystyle{d}={10.6} (all measured in yards). The angle between the two smallest sides is \displaystyle\alpha={99}^\circ.
What is the area of this quadrilateral?
